products.title: Devon Stripe Ocean Blue Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Add some real style and charm to your home with this delightful devon stripe ocean blue roman blind. A lovely ticking striped pattern is picked out here in sea blue and white to give it a coastal feel. That should help to create a sophisticated and relaxed atmosphere, making this

products.title: Devon Stripe Maritime Blue Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Blue and white stripes - such a classic! The combination has us thinking about maritime adventures and beautiful seaside cottages.
